        public DiamondHarvester3_4​(int street,
                           int avenue,
                           kareltherobot.Directions.Direction direction,
                           int beepers)
        Creates a DiamondHarvester3_4 object.
        Parameters:
        street - specifies the vertical position on the grid of this robot.
        avenue - specifies the horizontal position on the grid of this robot.
        direction - specifies the direction of this robot.
        beepers - specifies this robot's number of beepers.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        Karel moves diagonally up to the right.

      • harvestOneCrop

        public void harvestOneCrop()
        Karel moves diagonally to the right and picks up a beeper.
        Overrides:
        harvestOneCrop in class Harvester
        Precondition:
        The robot must be diagonally to the left of the beeper.
        Postcondition:
        The robot will end up on the corner of the beeper.

      • harvestOneRow

        public void harvestOneRow()
        Karel harvests one row of crops(beepers).
        Overrides:
        harvestOneRow in class Harvester
        Precondition:
        The robot must be on top of a beeper at the bottom of a diagonal row.
        Postcondition:
        The robot will end on top of the last beeper of the row.

      • harvestTwoRows

        public void harvestTwoRows()
        Karel harvests two diagonal rows of crops(beepers).
        Overrides:
        harvestTwoRows in class Harvester
        Precondition:
        Karel must be below the first beeper.
        Postcondition:
        Karel will end on the last beeper of the second row.

      • harvestField

        public void harvestField()
        Karel harvests a diamond shaped field.
        Precondition:
        Karel must be below the first beeper.
        Postcondition:
        Karel will end on the last beeper of the second row.
